fields_of_interest: Consumers, Business and Industry, Environment, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Leggi sui detersivi (Reg 648/2004/CE e segg.), REACH-CLP, normative cosmetici, normative biocidi, normative sicurezza sul lavoro, normative rifiuti. - Detergents, chemicals and waste laws; Bra Miljoval certificate pending
organisation_name: Bensos di Silvia Palladini & C. s.a.s. (Bensos)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Progettazione e produzione di detersivi e cosmetici ecologici, a bassa tossicità e anallergici, per uso domestico e professionale. - Conception and production of ecologic and non-toxic detergents and cosmetics, for household and professional use
